#
# Huawei VRP Basic Configuration
# Device: S5700 Series Switch
#
sysname SW-CORE-01
#
undo info-center enable
#
vlan batch 10 20 30 100 200
#
vlan 10
 name Management
 description Management VLAN
#
vlan 20
 name Users
 description User Access VLAN
#
vlan 30
 name Servers
 description Server Farm VLAN
#
interface Vlanif10
 ip address 10.10.10.1 255.255.255.0
 description Management Interface
#
interface Vlanif20
 ip address 10.20.20.1 255.255.255.0
 description User Gateway
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/1
 description Uplink to Core Router
 port link-type trunk
 port trunk allow-pass vlan 10 20 30
 undo shutdown
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/2
 description Server-01 Connection
 port link-type access
 port default vlan 30
 undo shutdown
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/3
 description User Port
 port link-type access
 port default vlan 20
 stp edged-port enable
 undo shutdown
#
interface GigabitEthernet 0/0/24
 description Management Port
 port link-type access
 port default vlan 10
 undo shutdown
#
ip route-static 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 10.10.10.254
#
ntp-service unicast-server 10.10.10.100
ntp-service unicast-server 10.10.10.101
#
info-center enable
info-center loghost 10.10.10.200
#
snmp-agent
snmp-agent sys-info version v2c v3
snmp-agent community read public
snmp-agent community write private
#
user-interface console 0
 authentication-mode password
 set authentication password cipher Password123
 idle-timeout 10 0
#
user-interface vty 0 4
 authentication-mode aaa
 protocol inbound ssh
 idle-timeout 15 0
#
aaa
 authentication-scheme default
 authorization-scheme default
 accounting-scheme default
 domain default
 domain default_admin
 local-user admin password irreversible-cipher Admin@123
 local-user admin privilege level 15
 local-user admin service-type ssh terminal
#
ssh server enable
ssh authentication-type default password
#
return
